name: SPLIT
description:
Sculpture Split 2020 was exhibited at the exhibition
On Being in New York and was the face of the exhibition
CURATOR: KIM POWER - POWER ART PROJECTS

In my work, the transmission of a person's state is a priority task. Since I'm thinking of immersing myself in a state, I can better contemplate art.

I convey state through an expressive approach to sculpture. Where there are many sensory reactions in terms of perception of both the world of metaphysics and the physical world.

The SPLIT reflects both Dionysian and Apollonian aspects. I am more inclined towards art, which carries both a rational and a sensual response to the world.
